author: arminw
msg: Attached is a patch for Logging Configuration. The problem was that the properties specified as arguments to Java from command line (running standalone as opposed to in Tomcat app server) were not being picked up properly.
change Boot-Logger level from WARN to INFO to force OJB printing information about the used logging configuration at startup, the default log-level is still WARN.

author: arminw
